title: svelte-canvas
alt: Screenshot of a scatterplot visualization built with svelte-canvas.
info: Svelte has been my go-to framework for a few years now, and I recently created this small library which provides an idiomatic wrapper component for the <canvas> element. Users can create layer components that encapsulate individual portions of the canvas, and write reactive render functions that redraw whenever the variables that they depend on change. The library enables canvas-based interactive visualizations to be built using familiar Svelte conventions.
